name: Lost Light (Delpire)
description:
Summary

A 3D puzzle game created for the Godot Wild Jam #46. Guide the lost light through the land to its home. Beware! There are monsters near. Use the grass to hide.

Created by Cadoink.

Note: If the game is too big for your browser. I recommend either playing in full screen, or zooming your browser window out a little bit.

Controls

WASD or the arrow keys to move

Spacebar to hide/interact

Theme
